body_html: One important requirement is that my API supports control flow ops. Do resource-based variables support "Switch", "Enter", etc., with their underlying value op, or do we need something like "RefSwitch", "RefEnter", etc.?
body_text: One important requirement is that my API supports control flow ops. Do resource-based variables support "Switch", "Enter", etc., with their underlying value op, or do we need something like "RefSwitch", "RefEnter", etc.?
body: One important requirement is that my API supports control flow ops. Do resource-based variables support "Switch", "Enter", etc., with their underlying value op, or do we need something like "RefSwitch", "RefEnter", etc.?
